Package de.mycrocast.android.sdk.live.listener.state

Interface LiveStreamListenerState

All Superinterfaces:
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<LiveStreamListenerState.Observer>
public interface LiveStreamListenerState extends de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<LiveStreamListenerState.Observer>
Interface to use for determining the play state for the livestreams

  • Method Details

    • hasCurrentLiveStream

      boolean hasCurrentLiveStream()
      Returns:
      true if we have currently a live stream in any play state that is not stopped

    • isCurrentLiveStream

      boolean isCurrentLiveStream(LiveStream liveStream)
      Parameters:
      liveStream - - the live stream we want to check
      Returns:
      true if this stream is our current live stream, false otherwise

    • isCurrentPausedLiveStream

      boolean isCurrentPausedLiveStream(LiveStream liveStream)
      Parameters:
      liveStream - - the live stream to check
      Returns:
      true if the livestream is our current stream and the stream is in paused state

    • isCurrentPlayingLiveStream

      boolean isCurrentPlayingLiveStream(LiveStream liveStream)
      Parameters:
      liveStream - the live stream to check
      Returns:
      true if the livestream is our current stream and the stream is in playing state
